divs: Sighting DetailsA glimmer of light caught my eye from my kitchen and i caught 5 photos from inside the window. these show ta star pattern which is the screen reflecting, so I went outside and investigated. I could see this light with the unaided eye for over twenty minutes, taking pics for ten. This object seemed to be between me and the bushes, but if i went towards it, it vanished. It would return when i gave some room. The pics i took, and two videos are all with different settings and focus for a variety of views. It was flashing so some don't show it as intense as others. The AVI files i included are probably the best evidence of what I actually saw. I went over to the bushes multiple times and found nothing which could explain these lights. My wife, and best friend also investigated after i showed them the photos and videos i am sending you, all without any explanatory findings I dont know what this is, but it is weird. Thank you. Jimi Hughes PS, i am available for contact, but only through confirmation by MUFON reps. I do not want 3rd party reps calling my house directly.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Conrad
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A light in my yard in the bushes 7 am June 9, 2009.
